<div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1661296281936-254972393-945846527" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1661296281936"
     data-page-id="254972393"
     data-session-id="945846527"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;fixedCols&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalrow&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ddSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;Filtration%20Panel&quot;,&quot;limitHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;default&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalRowName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalColName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1661296281936&quot;,&quot;formatVersion&quot;:&quot;2&quot;,&quot;order&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;inverse&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;numbering&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;isNew&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalcol&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;rowsPerPage&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;,&quot;labels&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;thousandSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ignoreFirstNrows&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;heightValue&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;isOR&quot;:&quot;AND&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1661296281936-254972393-945846527">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1661296281936-254972393-945846527');
                if ("Filtration Panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1661296281936",
                        pageId: "254972393",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: 945846527,
                        hidePane: "Filtration Panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296281936"][data-pageid="254972393"][data-sessionid="945846527"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296281936"][data-pageid="254972393"][data-sessionid="945846527"] #comboBoxDiv-1661296281936').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296281936"][data-pageid="254972393"][data-sessionid="945846527"] #comboBoxDiv-1661296281936').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
</div></div><h2 id="id-202201ERGOPPro3.0Deployment-ERGIssuesList">ERG Issues List</h2>

     data-macro-id="1661296330705"
     data-page-id="254972393"
     data-session-id="1984170346"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;fixedCols&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalrow&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ddSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;Filtration%20Panel&quot;,&quot;limitHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;default&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalRowName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalColName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1661296330705&quot;,&quot;formatVersion&quot;:&quot;2&quot;,&quot;order&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;inverse&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;numbering&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;isNew&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalcol&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;rowsPerPage&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;,&quot;labels&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;thousandSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ignoreFirstNrows&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;heightValue&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;isOR&quot;:&quot;AND&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1661296330705-254972393-1984170346">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1661296330705-254972393-1984170346');
                if ("Filtration Panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1661296330705",
                        pageId: "254972393",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: 1984170346,
                        hidePane: "Filtration Panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296330705"][data-pageid="254972393"][data-sessionid="1984170346"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296330705"][data-pageid="254972393"][data-sessionid="1984170346"] #comboBoxDiv-1661296330705').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296330705"][data-pageid="254972393"][data-sessionid="1984170346"] #comboBoxDiv-1661296330705').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
<p><br/></p><p><br/></p>

<h1 style="text-align: left;" id="id-202212DisplayReplacementFieldTestIssueRegister-D10S5-A(V1000)">D10S5-A (V1000)</h1><hr/><p>The following ticket raised on V1000 screen deployment to Customer AMM in Indonesia:</p><ul style="list-style-type: square;"><li>OP Pro 3.0-003 running chromium web panels</li><li>V1000 Screen (64 bit MASEP 3.3.3-RC8) + CoreLP LTE (32 bit base-installer 2.26.5)</li></ul>

Showing 0 rows"></div><div class="lockPosition"><div class="filter-container"><label class="hideble">The filter is disabled at the moment.</label></div><div class="tf-menu-buttons aui-toolbar2" role="toolbar"><div class="aui-toolbar2-inner"><div class="aui-toolbar2-primary"><div class="tf-btn-container"><div class="tf-btn-row settings-row"><div class="tf-settings-wrapper"><div class="filter-settings aui-button aui-button-subtle aui-dropdown2-trigger" aria-owns="filter-menu-view-lock-1689227736936_1862873302-281899702--1745672018"><span class="aui-icon aui-icon-small aui-iconfont-configure"></span></div><div id="filter-menu-view-lock-1689227736936_1862873302-281899702--1745672018" class="aui-style-default aui-dropdown2 tfac-menu" style="display: none; Please wait for a bit ...<span class="aui-icon aui-icon-wait" style="margin-left: 5px"></span></p></div></div><div class="tf-hider-wrapper" title="Hide filtration pane"><div class="tf-hider"><span class="tf-hide-show-icon"></span></div></div></div><div id="tf-shower-1689227736936_1862873302" class="tf-shower-wrapper" title="Show filtration pane"><div class="tf-shower"><span class="tf-hide-show-icon"></span></div></div><div id="tf-table-1689227736936_1862873302--1745672018" class="tablefilter-table-wrapper tf-source  ">

<div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1689227736936_1862873302-281899702--1745672018" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1689227736936_1862873302"
     data-page-id="281899702"
     data-session-id="-1745672018"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;fixedCols&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalrow&quot;:&quot;%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C&quot;,&quot;hidelabels&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;ddSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;Filtration%20panel&quot;,&quot;limitHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkline&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;default&quot;:&quot;Pending%20resolution%26%26Unresolved%2C&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;250%2C150&quot;,&quot;hideColumns&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;totalRowName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalColName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;disabled&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;enabledInEditor&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;globalFilter&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1689227736936_1862873302&quot;,&quot;iconfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;order&quot;:&quot;1%2C0&quot;,&quot;hideControls&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;inverse&quot;:&quot;false%2Cfalse&quot;,&quot;numbering&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;datefilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;column&quot;:&quot;Resolution&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalcol&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;disableSave&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;rowsPerPage&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;,&quot;labels&quot;:&quot;Resolution%E2%80%9AFilter%20whole%20table&quot;,&quot;thousandSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ignoreFirstNrows&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ddOperator&quot;:&quot;OR&quot;,&quot;userfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;datepattern&quot;:&quot;yy-mm-dd&quot;,&quot;numberfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;heightValue&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;updateSelectOptions&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;worklog&quot;:&quot;365%7C5%7C8%7Cy%20w%20d%20h%20m%7Cy%20w%20d%20h%20m&quot;,&quot;isOR&quot;:&quot;AND&quot;,&quot;showNRowsifNotFiltered&quot;:&quot;&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1689227736936_1862873302-281899702--1745672018">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1689227736936_1862873302-281899702--1745672018');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1689227736936_1862873302",
                        pageId: "281899702",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "1,0",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "OR",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: ",,,,,,,,,,,,,",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "365|5|8|y w d h m|y w d h m",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -1745672018,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689227736936_1862873302"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-1745672018"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689227736936_1862873302"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-1745672018"] #comboBoxDiv-1689227736936_1862873302').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689227736936_1862873302"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-1745672018"] #comboBoxDiv-1689227736936_1862873302').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">
<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
<div class="panel" style="border-width: 1px;"><div class="panelHeader" style="border-bottom-width: 1px;"><b>D9S2-B (X900)</b></div><div class="panelContent">

<div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1689229988151_1389443964-281899702-878634419" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1689229988151_1389443964"
     data-page-id="281899702"
     data-session-id="878634419"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;fixedCols&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalrow&quot;:&quot;%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C&quot;,&quot;hidelabels&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;ddSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;Filtration%20panel&quot;,&quot;limitHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkline&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;default&quot;:&quot;Unresolved%2C&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;250%2C150&quot;,&quot;hideColumns&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;totalRowName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalColName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;disabled&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;enabledInEditor&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;globalFilter&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1689229988151_1389443964&quot;,&quot;iconfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;order&quot;:&quot;1%2C0&quot;,&quot;hideControls&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;inverse&quot;:&quot;false%2Cfalse&quot;,&quot;numbering&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;datefilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;column&quot;:&quot;Resolution&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalcol&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;disableSave&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;rowsPerPage&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;,&quot;labels&quot;:&quot;Resolution%E2%80%9AFilter%20whole%20table&quot;,&quot;thousandSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ignoreFirstNrows&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ddOperator&quot;:&quot;OR&quot;,&quot;userfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;datepattern&quot;:&quot;yy-mm-dd&quot;,&quot;numberfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;heightValue&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;updateSelectOptions&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;worklog&quot;:&quot;365%7C5%7C8%7Cy%20w%20d%20h%20m%7Cy%20w%20d%20h%20m&quot;,&quot;isOR&quot;:&quot;AND&quot;,&quot;showNRowsifNotFiltered&quot;:&quot;&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1689229988151_1389443964-281899702-878634419">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1689229988151_1389443964-281899702-878634419');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1689229988151_1389443964",
                        pageId: "281899702",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "1,0",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "OR",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: ",,,,,,,,,,,,,",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "365|5|8|y w d h m|y w d h m",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: 878634419,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689229988151_1389443964"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="878634419"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689229988151_1389443964"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="878634419"] #comboBoxDiv-1689229988151_1389443964').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689229988151_1389443964"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="878634419"] #comboBoxDiv-1689229988151_1389443964').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
</div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">

</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1689230172766_1786597613-281899702--1151381639">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1689230172766_1786597613-281899702--1151381639');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("dd M yy"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1689230172766_1786597613",
                        pageId: "281899702",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "0",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "OR",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: ",,,,,,,,,,,,",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "365|5|8|y w d h m|y w d h m",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -1151381639,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689230172766_1786597613"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-1151381639"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689230172766_1786597613"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-1151381639"] #comboBoxDiv-1689230172766_1786597613').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689230172766_1786597613"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-1151381639"] #comboBoxDiv-1689230172766_1786597613').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
</div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
<div class="panel" style="border-width: 1px;"><div class="panelHeader" style="border-bottom-width: 1px;"><b>D9S6-A (DisplayX)</b></div><div class="panelContent">
<div class="tablefilter-outer-wrapper  " id="table-filter-1689230224393_-1311391165" data-id="1689230224393_-1311391165" data-pageid="281899702" data-sessionid="-494376776"><div id="comboBoxDiv-1689230224393_-1311391165--494376776" class="tableFilterCbStyle conf-macro-render"><div class="lockDisabled not-empty"><form class="aui tf-form aui-legacy-forms prevent-default-form" name="inlinecommentform"><div class="filter-container filter-icon filter-logo default " title="Nothing filtered. class="disableLock cursor-pointer"><span class="aui-icon aui-icon-small aui-iconfont-plan-disabled"></span>Disable all filters</a></li><li><a class="filter-sort-reset cursor-pointer aui-iconfont-more"></span>Modify Settings</a></li></ul></div><div class="aui-dropdown2-section"><ul class="aui-list-truncate"><li><a class="get-tf-url cursor-pointer"><span class="aui-icon class="aui-icon aui-icon-small aui-iconfont-pdf"></span>Export to PDF</a></li><li><a class="export-file-csv cursor-pointer"><span class="aui-icon aui-icon-small aui-iconfont-table"></span>Export to CSV</a></li><li><a class="export-file-doc cursor-pointer"><span class="aui-icon aui-icon-small aui-iconfont-document"></span>Export to Word</a></li><li><a class="export-file-print app</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="sortable-container"></div><div class="filter-container show-n-rows-only-message"><label>Showing the first  rows</label></div><div class="filter-container empty-message"><label>Start <a class="tf-add-start">adding filters</a> in the filter tools menu.</label></div></form></div><div class="lockEnabled"><div class="filter-container filter-icon filter-logo default" title="Nothing filtered. Showing 0 rows"></div><div class="lockPosition"><div class="filter-container"><label class="hideble">The filter is disabled at the moment.</label></div><div class="tf-menu-buttons aui-toolbar2" role="toolbar"><div class="aui-toolbar2-inner"><div class="aui-toolbar2-primary"><div class="tf-btn-container"><div class="tf-btn-row settings-row"><div class="tf-settings-wrapper"><div class="filter-settings aui-button aui-button-subtle aui-dropdown2-trigger" aria-owns="filter-menu-view-lock-1689230224393_-1311391165-281899702--494376776"><span class="aui-icon aui-icon-small aui-iconfont-configure"></span></div><div id="filter-menu-view-lock-1689230224393_-1311391165-281899702--494376776" class="aui-style-default aui-dropdown2 tfac-menu" style="display: none; </div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1689230224393_-1311391165-281899702--494376776">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1689230224393_-1311391165-281899702--494376776');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1689230224393_-1311391165",
                        pageId: "281899702",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "0",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "OR",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: ",,,,,,,,,,,,",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "365|5|8|y w d h m|y w d h m",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -494376776,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689230224393_-1311391165"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-494376776"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689230224393_-1311391165"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-494376776"] #comboBoxDiv-1689230224393_-1311391165').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689230224393_-1311391165"][data-pageid="281899702"][data-sessionid="-494376776"] #comboBoxDiv-1689230224393_-1311391165').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>

                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : 2023-02 Buenavista del Cobre - OP Pro 3.0 Deployment
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> FARIA Anderson</span>, last modified by <span class='editor'> GEORGE Nathan</span> on sept 22, 2023
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <p>Buenavista del Cobre (Cananea)</p><p><br/></p><p><br/></p><div class="panel" style="border-width: 1px;"><div class="panelHeader" style="border-bottom-width: 1px;"><b>Summary</b></div><div class="panelContent">
<p>        <div>
            <span class="oauth-msg">
                <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a>
                para ver datos del tique
            </span>
    </div>
    <div class="two-dimensional-chart">
    <div class="aui-message-container"><div class="aui-message warning">El servidor de Jira no comprendió su consulta de búsqueda. Si has introducido JQL, asegúrate de que está formado correctamente. Si has introducido una clave de tique, asegúrate de que exista y de que tienes permiso para verla.</div></div>
</div>
</p><p><br/></p>
</div></div><div class="panel" style="border-width: 1px;"><div class="panelHeader" style="border-bottom-width: 1px;"><b>4.0 Field Trial</b></div><div class="panelContent">

     data-macro-id="1689753230043_-107468351"

     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;fixedCols&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalrow&quot;:&quot;%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C%2C&quot;,&quot;hidelabels&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;ddSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;Filtration%20panel&quot;,&quot;limitHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkline&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;default&quot;:&quot;Unresolved&quot;,&quot;isFirstTimeEnter&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;250&quot;,&quot;hideColumns&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;totalRowName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalColName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;disabled&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;enabledInEditor&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;globalFilter&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1689753230043_-107468351&quot;,&quot;iconfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;order&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;hideControls&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;inverse&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;numbering&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;datefilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;column&quot;:&quot;Resolution&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalcol&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;disableSave&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;rowsPerPage&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;,&quot;labels&quot;:&quot;Resolution&quot;,&quot;thousandSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ignoreFirstNrows&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ddOperator&quot;:&quot;OR&quot;,&quot;userfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;datepattern&quot;:&quot;dd%20M%20yy&quot;,&quot;numberfilter&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;heightValue&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;updateSelectOptions&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;worklog&quot;:&quot;365%7C5%7C8%7Cy%20w%20d%20h%20m%7Cy%20w%20d%20h%20m&quot;,&quot;isOR&quot;:&quot;AND&quot;,&quot;showNRowsifNotFiltered&quot;:&quot;&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1689753230043_-107468351-290560800--1295234782">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1689753230043_-107468351-290560800--1295234782');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("dd M yy"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1689753230043_-107468351",
                        pageId: "290560800",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "0",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "OR",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: ",,,,,,,,,,",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "365|5|8|y w d h m|y w d h m",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -1295234782,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689753230043_-107468351"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1295234782"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689753230043_-107468351"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1295234782"] #comboBoxDiv-1689753230043_-107468351').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1689753230043_-107468351"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1295234782"] #comboBoxDiv-1689753230043_-107468351').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>

                                <div class="aui-message aui-message-info info">

                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </td>
                </tr>

        </table>
    </div>
            <div class="refresh-issues-bottom">

<div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1661296281936-290560800--1643560853" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1661296281936"
     data-page-id="290560800"
     data-session-id="-1643560853"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;fixedCols&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalrow&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ddSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;Filtration%20Panel&quot;,&quot;limitHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;default&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalRowName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalColName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1661296281936&quot;,&quot;formatVersion&quot;:&quot;2&quot;,&quot;order&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;inverse&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;numbering&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;isNew&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalcol&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;rowsPerPage&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;,&quot;labels&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;thousandSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ignoreFirstNrows&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;heightValue&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;isOR&quot;:&quot;AND&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1661296281936-290560800--1643560853">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1661296281936-290560800--1643560853');
                if ("Filtration Panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1661296281936",
                        pageId: "290560800",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -1643560853,
                        hidePane: "Filtration Panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296281936"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1643560853"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296281936"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1643560853"] #comboBoxDiv-1661296281936').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296281936"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1643560853"] #comboBoxDiv-1661296281936').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
</div></div><h2 id="id-202302BuenavistadelCobreOPPro3.0Deployment-CananeaIssuesList">Cananea Issues List</h2>

<p>
    
        
    
        
    <div id="jira-issues-771712522" style="width: 100%;  overflow: auto;"
         class="jira-issues">
        <table class="aui" >
            <tbody>
                <tr></tr>                 <tr>

                    <td colspan="11">
                        <div class="jira-oauth-message-marker">

</div></div>
<div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1661296330705-290560800--1963337058" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1661296330705"
     data-page-id="290560800"
     data-session-id="-1963337058"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;fixedCols&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalrow&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ddSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;Filtration%20Panel&quot;,&quot;limitHeight&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;default&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalRowName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalColName&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1661296330705&quot;,&quot;formatVersion&quot;:&quot;2&quot;,&quot;order&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;inverse&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;numbering&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;isNew&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;totalcol&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;rowsPerPage&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;,&quot;labels&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;thousandSeparator&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;ignoreFirstNrows&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;heightValue&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;isOR&quot;:&quot;AND&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1661296330705-290560800--1963337058">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1661296330705-290560800--1963337058');
                if ("Filtration Panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1661296330705",
                        pageId: "290560800",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -1963337058,
                        hidePane: "Filtration Panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296330705"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1963337058"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296330705"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1963337058"] #comboBoxDiv-1661296330705').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1661296330705"][data-pageid="290560800"][data-sessionid="-1963337058"] #comboBoxDiv-1661296330705').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
<p><br/></p><p><br/></p>

<div class="innerCell">
<h3 id="id-202402ERG3.0002Stability-ActionRegister">Action Register</h3><h4 id="id-202402ERG3.0002Stability-Shorttermactions">Short term actions</h4><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup><col/><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Action#</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Action</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Notes</th></tr><tr><td class="confluenceTd">ST01</td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><br/></p><ul class="inline-task-list" data-inline-tasks-content-id="331677920"><li class="checked" data-inline-task-id="1"><span class="placeholder-inline-tasks">Check that &quot;data=writeback&quot; configuration being used for ext4 partition on Core running Platform 2.26 <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="SOEY" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~SOEY" data-linked-resource-id="50988285" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">SHE KHUN Oey</a> </span></li></ul><p><br/></p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p>Done. Configuration in place <time datetime="2022-02-25" class="date-past">25 feb 2022</time> on Platform 2.26.1</p></div></td></tr><tr><td class="confluenceTd">ST02</td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><br/></p><ul class="inline-task-list" data-inline-tasks-content-id="331677920"><li class="checked" data-inline-task-id="2">S&amp;S to confirm that 
<span class="jira-issue lock-jira-issue MOPS-25852"
      data-jira-key="MOPS-25852" >
        <a class=issue-link" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/MOPS-25852?src=confmacro">MOPS-25852</a>
        <span class="oauth-msg"> -
            <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a> para ver datos del tique
        </span>
    </span>
 script has been run at ERG sites to filter phrase table by device</li></ul><p><br/></p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><time datetime="2024-02-09" class="date-past">9 feb 2024</time> Update requested. <a class="external-link" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/IN-5858" rel="nofollow">https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/IN-5858</a></p></div></td></tr><tr><td class="confluenceTd">ST03</td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><ul class="inline-task-list" data-inline-tasks-content-id="331677920"><li class="checked" data-inline-task-id="3"><span class="placeholder-inline-tasks">PD remote access to ERG to be requested <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="GENA" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~GENA" data-linked-resource-id="202706461" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">GEORGE Nathan</a> </span></li></ul></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><time datetime="2024-02-09" class="date-past">9 feb 2024</time> Requested 
<span class="jira-issue lock-jira-issue IN-5819"
      data-jira-key="IN-5819" >
        <a class=issue-link" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/IN-5819?src=confmacro">IN-5819</a>
        <span class="oauth-msg"> -
            <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a> para ver datos del tique
        </span>
    </span>
</p></div></td></tr><tr><td class="confluenceTd">ST04</td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><ul class="inline-task-list" data-inline-tasks-content-id="331677920"><li class="checked" data-inline-task-id="4"><span class="placeholder-inline-tasks">Obtain copy of onboard database and confirm dump size and largest tables <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="VIFA" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~VIFA" data-linked-resource-id="306056666" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">VIEIRA Fabio</a> </span></li></ul></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><time datetime="2024-02-09" class="date-past">9 feb 2024</time> Requested 
<span class="jira-issue lock-jira-issue IN-5858"
      data-jira-key="IN-5858" >
        <a class=issue-link" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/IN-5858?src=confmacro">IN-5858</a>
        <span class="oauth-msg"> -
            <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a> para ver datos del tique
        </span>
    </span>
</p></div></td></tr><tr><td class="confluenceTd">ST05</td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><ul class="inline-task-list" data-inline-tasks-content-id="331677920"><li class="checked" data-inline-task-id="11"><span class="placeholder-inline-tasks"><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="SOEY" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~SOEY" data-linked-resource-id="50988285" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">SHE KHUN Oey</a>  to document the issues with the update device phrases process </span>

        <span class="oauth-msg"> -

        </span>
    </span>
</li></ul></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><time datetime="2024-02-23" class="date-past">23 feb 2024</time> feedback provided on ticket</p></div></td></tr><tr><td (6-12 months)</h4><div class="table-wrap"><table class="relative-table wrapped confluenceTable" style="width: 74.1036%;"><colgroup><col style="width: 5.61133%;"/><col style="width: 62.3396%;"/><col style="width: 32.0491%;"/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Action#</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Action</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Notes</th></tr><tr><td class="confluenceTd">LT01</td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><br/></p><ul class="inline-task-list" data-inline-tasks-content-id="331677920"><li class="checked" data-inline-task-id="10"><span class="placeholder-inline-tasks">Deprecate JAMS from OP Pro system architecture.<br/>Rewrite of JAction, JOptimizer modules in GVOS <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="OLAN" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~OLAN" data-linked-resource-id="42042266" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">FARIA Anderson</a> </span></li></ul><p><br/></p></div><a data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">GEORGE Nathan</a> </td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p>Assess feasibility of incorporating into MT05</p><p><br/></p><p><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="GENA" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~GENA" data-linked-resource-id="202706461" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">GEORGE Nathan</a> </p><p>Regarding including JAMS modules as GVOS modules is a call that need to be done by the architecture team. </p><p>Besides, this goes beyond only of OP Pro re-architecture, it needs to align with One Platform architecture. </p><p>So, how to re-architect would be an action for <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="JEMM" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~JEMM" data-linked-resource-id="281897204" data-linked-resource-version="1" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">JAY Emmanuel</a>  and <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="NART" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~NART" data-linked-resource-id="139659250" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">QUEIROZ Arthur</a> .</p></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">
<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
<h2 id="id-202402ERG3.0002Stability-GVOSDatabaseLocksIssue">GVOS Database Locks Issue</h2><p>
<span class="jira-issue lock-jira-issue IN-5858"
      data-jira-key="IN-5858" >
        <a class=issue-link" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/IN-5858?src=confmacro">IN-5858</a>
        <span class="oauth-msg"> -
            <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a> para ver datos del tique
        </span>
    </span>
</p><p><time datetime="2024-02-09" class="date-past">9 feb 2024</time> <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="OJO" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~OJO" data-linked-resource-id="1998936" data-linked-resource-version="1" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">Usuario desconocido (ojo)</a> </p><p>The GVOS errors were mostly &quot;database is locked&quot; issues.</p><p>This error occurs because SQLite uses Posix file locking to share the database between multiple processes. In all OAS and OpPro installations, there are only two processes that directly access the SQLite database file:</p><ul><li><p>gv_main - the main GVOS application server process</p></li><li><p>gvcleaner - a background process which saves a clean copy of the sqlite database every 5 minutes.</p></li></ul><p>Each query submitted by gv_main to the database waits for up to 5 seconds when SQLite returns a BUSY error indicating that another process has the database locked.  If the database is locked for more than 5 seconds, the query returns with a the 'database is locked' error. </p><p><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">I have found on OAS deployments that the Micron 32GB eMMC flash used on all Core computers has severe performance issues whenever the on-chip FTL performs block garbage collection.   In many cases, the eMMC is locked for over 10 seconds causing timeout errors in GVOS.  We discovered the same performance issues using the 16GB Micron flash chips on OASLV, so we negotiated with Variscite to only supply Samsung eMMC chips that do not exhibit this performance slowdown.  These flash slowdowns are random and caused by the Micron FTL which has  insufficient buffering on 32G and smaller flash chips. </span></p><p><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">On OAS OpenWRT builds, we use the f2fs file system which performs much better than the standard ext4 file system used on the Yocto 32 release.  The better performance of f2fs is because eMMC chips support a TRIM command which allows the file system to inform the eMMC memory chip of blocks which are no longer used.  The ext4 file system was designed for rotational disks and SSDs and performs poorly on eMMC.  Supporting TRIM in f2fs allows the FTL to pre-erase unused blocks eliminating most of the garbage collection delays.  Using an ext4 file system with the default &quot;data=ordered&quot; configuration exacerbates the performance delays of eMMC chips.</span></p><p><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">To speed access to the on-board eMMC, we can try one of the following options.</span></p><ol><li><p><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">If using ext4, change the mount options to &quot;data=writeback&quot;.</span></p></li><li><p><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">Reformat the data partition on which the SQLite database is storesd as f2fs.  On Yocto 32, this will probably require adding f2fs to the Linux kernel.</span></p></li><li><p><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">Store the active SQLite database in RAM, allowing gvcleaner to write a non-volatile copy to eMMC.  Doing this would speed database access but lose up to 5 minutes of data after a reboot.</span></p></li><li><p><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">Shrink the size of the on-board database.  Currently, the largest database table is &quot;phrases&quot; which contains allot of MineOPS phrase translations that are never required on-board.  Setting the 'device' for each phrase and allowing phrases to replicate only those phrases necessary for on-board use will significantly decrease the OpPro on-board database size and decrease the delay for database synchronization.</span></p></li></ol><p><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);"><time datetime="2024-02-09" class="date-past">9 feb 2024</time> <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="OLAN" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~OLAN" data-linked-resource-id="42042266" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">FARIA Anderson</a> </span></p><p class="x_MsoNormal">Based on the issues, and as you pointed out, issues seems to be related with database access/performance. From Jon’s e-mail I think the quickest check we can do is item 4.</p><p class="x_MsoNormal">For this we can do some actions:</p><ul><li class="x_MsoListParagraph">Get equipment sqlite database and check the dump size and which table(s) are larger and evaluate what can be done in terms of configuration to reduce them;</li><li class="x_MsoListParagraph">As Jon mention, in ERG in the beginning of deployment we have find out the most consuming table were phrases tables and we need to adjust the sqlite timeout already. With the parm configuration we have reduced/avoid the issue. After that we have written an script to configure the devices and phrases table to sync to equipment only the phrases that would be used onboard, reducing the total database almost for the half. We have put the script available under<span> </span><a class="external-link" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/MOPS-25852" rel="nofollow" style="text-decoration: underline;">MOPS-25852</a><span> </span>and have asked S&amp;S team to run it on site.</li></ul></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
                    </div>

                                        
                                                      
                </div>             </div>

                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : 2024-06 AMM BIB 4.0-000 Critical Escalations

                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <h2 id="id-202406AMMBIB4.0000CriticalEscalations-DailyHypercareMeetings">Daily Hypercare Meetings</h2><p>Starting from <time datetime="2024-06-25" class="date-past">25 jun 2024</time> 0700 hrs (GMT+8) weekdays</p><h2 id="id-202406AMMBIB4.0000CriticalEscalations-BIBHypercareIssuesSummary">BIB Hypercare Issues Summary</h2><p>        <div>
            <span class="oauth-msg">
                <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a>
                para ver datos del tique
            </span>
    </div>
    <div class="two-dimensional-chart">
    <div class="aui-message-container"><div class="aui-message warning">El servidor de Jira no comprendió su consulta de búsqueda. Si has introducido JQL, asegúrate de que está formado correctamente. Si has introducido una clave de tique, asegúrate de que exista y de que tienes permiso para verla.</div></div>
</div>
</p><h2 id="id-202406AMMBIB4.0000CriticalEscalations-BIBIssuesSummary">BIB Issues Summary</h2><p>        <div>
            <span class="oauth-msg">
                <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a>
                para ver datos del tique
            </span>
    </div>
    <div class="two-dimensional-chart">
    <div class="aui-message-container"><div class="aui-message warning">El servidor de Jira no comprendió su consulta de búsqueda. Si has introducido JQL, asegúrate de que está formado correctamente. Si has introducido una clave de tique, asegúrate de que exista y de que tienes permiso para verla.</div></div>
</div>
</p><h2 id="id-202406AMMBIB4.0000CriticalEscalations-IssueRegisters">Issue Registers</h2><div id="expander-1653886666" class="expand-container"><div role="heading" aria-level="6" id="expander-control-1653886666" class="expand-control"><button type="button" id="expand-button-1653886666" class="aui-button aui-button-link aui-button-link-icon-text" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="expander-content-1653886666" ><span class="expand-icon aui-icon aui-icon-small aui-iconfont-chevron-down" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="expand-control-text conf-macro-render">BIB Open Hypercare Issues</span></button></div><div role="region" id="expander-content-1653886666" class="expand-content" aria-labelledby="expand-button-1653886666"><p>

2024-Q4-BVC-Hypercare-issues-status_356792829.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : 2024-Q4 BVC Hypercare issues status</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="Product-Support_254971960.html">Product Support</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="2023-10-BVC-Critical-Escalations_317039822.html">2023-10 BVC Critical Escalations</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : 2024-Q4 BVC Hypercare issues status
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> FARIA Anderson</span>, last modified by <span class='editor'> VIEIRA Fabio</span> on oct 07, 2024
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <div class="contentLayout2">
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">
<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
<div class="panel" style="border-width: 1px;"><div class="panelHeader" style="border-bottom-width: 1px;"><b>Summary</b></div><div class="panelContent">
<p>

        <span class="oauth-msg">
            <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a>
        para ver datos del tique
        </span>
    <div class="jira-chart-macro-preview-container">
    <div class="aui-message-container"><div class="aui-message warning">El servidor de Jira no comprendió su consulta de búsqueda. Si has introducido JQL, asegúrate de que está formado correctamente. Si has introducido una clave de tique, asegúrate de que exista y de que tienes permiso para verla.</div></div>
</div>
         <div>
            <span class="oauth-msg">
                <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a>
                para ver datos del tique
            </span>
    </div>
    <div class="two-dimensional-chart">
    <div class="aui-message-container"><div class="aui-message warning">El servidor de Jira no comprendió su consulta de búsqueda. Si has introducido JQL, asegúrate de que está formado correctamente. Si has introducido una clave de tique, asegúrate de que exista y de que tienes permiso para verla.</div></div>
</div>
</p>
</div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">
<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
