2025-05-Ero-Copper_391617191.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : 2025-05 Ero Copper</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="Product-Support_254971960.html">Product Support</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : 2025-05 Ero Copper
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> RAJENDRAN Vanitha</span>, last modified on may 09, 2025
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <h2 id="id-202505EroCopper-CoreLTEDHCPnotworkingproperlywithOpenVPN"><span style="color: rgb(23,43,77);">Core LTE DHCP not working properly with OpenVPN</span></h2><p style="text-align: left;"><strong>How should the system behave?</strong></p><p style="text-align: left;">When in a area with bad network signal, the core loses connection but when he connects again he can communicate to the server through OpenVPN without any problems.<br/>This happens when using WI-FI, WI-FI with DHCP, and LTE without DHCP.</p><p style="text-align: left;"><strong>How does the system behave?</strong></p><p style="text-align: left;">When using core with LTE and DHCP, after entering in a area with bad network signal the core loses connection. But when he connects again he can't communicate to the server through OpenVPN.<br/>It's necessary to manually restart the OpenVPN service to make him able to communicate with the server again.</p><p style="text-align: left;"><strong>How does this impact the end user?</strong></p><p style="text-align: left;">All the equipments in the site are experiencing this problem because they use LTE with DHCP.<br/>They lose connection and can't communicate with the server afterwards, making impossible for them receiving assignments and sending data to the server.</p><p style="text-align: left;"><strong>How to reproduce the issue? (If able to)</strong></p><p style="text-align: left;">1-Setup a core using LTE and DHCP connecting to a local network.<br/>2-Turn off the router and after a few minutes turn it on.<br/>3-Try communicating with the local server through the equipment.</p><p style="text-align: left;"><strong>What is the initial analysis?</strong></p><p style="text-align: left;">After the tests made by<span> </span><a class="external-link" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=JNEL" rel="nofollow" title="Follow link">JUNIOR Nelson</a><span> </span>, we were able to identify that when the equipment that is using LTE loses connection with the network during a few minutes, it keeps the OpenVPN tunnel active (tun0) but it can't communicate with the server.<br/>Even after reconnecting the LTE network, the issue persists.</p><p style="text-align: left;">This problem occurs because when the<span> </span><ins>core loses connection with the LTE network,</ins><span> </span>the tunnel should be reseted so the connection is reestabilished.</p><p style="text-align: left;">Nelson Junior made a workaround for this issue, creating and testing a script that watches the LTE connection and after the connection is lost and recovered,</p><p style="text-align: left;">it restarts the OpenVPN service so the tunnel can be recreated and the communication with the server is established .<br/>**</p><p style="text-align: left;"><strong>The solution is attached to this ticket.</strong><br/>This scripts run on crontab like the following example:<br/>@reboot sleep 45 &amp;&amp; /home/jigsaw/checkvpn start</p><p style="text-align: left;">Tickets: </p><ol class="aui-nav aui-nav-breadcrumbs" style="text-align: left;"><li><a class="external-link" data-issue-key="MOAE-759" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/MOAE-759" rel="nofollow">MOAE-759</a></li><li><a class="external-link" data-issue-key="PLAT-6550" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/PLAT-6550" rel="nofollow">PLAT-6550</a></li><li><a class="external-link" data-issue-key="PLAT-6520" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/PLAT-6520" rel="nofollow">PLAT-6520</a></li></ol><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable" data-snooker-col-series="numbers" data-snooker-locked-cols="0"><colgroup><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="numberingColumn confluenceTh" contenteditable="false" data-mce-resize="false" scope="col"><br/></th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Date</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Action</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Equipment updated</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">SW Version</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Result</th><th scope="col" class="confluenceTh">Comments</th></tr><tr><td class="numberingColumn confluenceTd" contenteditable="false" data-mce-resize="false">1</td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td></tr><tr><td class="numberingColumn confluenceTd" contenteditable="false" data-mce-resize="false">2</td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td></tr><tr><td class="numberingColumn confluenceTd" contenteditable="false" data-mce-resize="false">3</td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td></tr></tbody></table></div><p style="text-align: left;"><br/></p>
                    </div>

                                        
                                                      
                </div>             </div> 
            <div id="footer" role="contentinfo">
                <section class="footer-body">
                    <p>Document generated by Confluence on dic 05, 2025 11:19</p>
                    <div id="footer-logo"><a href="https://www.atlassian.com/">Atlassian</a></div>
                </section>
            </div>
        </div>     </body>
</html>

                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : Shovel LP &amp; HP

                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> GEORGE Nathan</span>, last modified by <span class='editor'> HOLDEN Anthony</span> on oct 11, 2022

class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="confluence-embedded-file-wrapper"><a class="confluence-embedded-file" <div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1479854466087_848748430-150307605-949445157" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1479854466087_848748430"
     data-page-id="150307605"
     data-session-id="949445157"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;inverse&quot;:&quot;false%2Cfalse&quot;,&quot;default&quot;:&quot;All%20HP%20Products%7CShovel%2CProduct&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;%2C&quot;,&quot;hideColumns&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;userfilter&quot;:&quot;Product&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;datepattern&quot;:&quot;yy-mm-dd&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1479854466087_848748430&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1479854466087_848748430-150307605-949445157">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1479854466087_848748430-150307605-949445157');
                if ("true" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1479854466087_848748430",
                        pageId: "150307605",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: 949445157,
                        hidePane: "true",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1479854466087_848748430"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="949445157"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1479854466087_848748430"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="949445157"] #comboBoxDiv-1479854466087_848748430').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1479854466087_848748430"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="949445157"] #comboBoxDiv-1479854466087_848748430').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
</div></div>
<div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1468464265286_-864428481-150307605--2081390840" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1468464265286_-864428481"
     data-page-id="150307605"
     data-session-id="-2081390840"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;default&quot;:&quot;%2C%2C%2C&quot;,&quot;cell-width&quot;:&quot;%2C%2C%2C&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;userfilter&quot;:&quot;Publication%2CLink&quot;,&quot;column&quot;:&quot;Type%2CDistribution&quot;,&quot;datepattern&quot;:&quot;yy-mm-dd&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1468464265286_-864428481&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;Distribution%20(%E2%80%8DAsc)%2CType%20(%E2%80%8DAsc)%2CDocument%20(%E2%80%8DAsc)&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1468464265286_-864428481-150307605--2081390840">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1468464265286_-864428481-150307605--2081390840');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: ["Distribution (\u200dAsc)","Type (\u200dAsc)","Document (\u200dAsc)"],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1468464265286_-864428481",
                        pageId: "150307605",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -2081390840,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1468464265286_-864428481"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-2081390840"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1468464265286_-864428481"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-2081390840"] #comboBoxDiv-1468464265286_-864428481').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1468464265286_-864428481"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-2081390840"] #comboBoxDiv-1468464265286_-864428481').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
</div></div><p style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);"><span class="confluence-anchor-link" id="ShovelLP&amp;HP-multimedia"></span></span></p><div class="panel" style="border-style: solid;border-width: 1px;"><div class="panelHeader" style="border-bottom-width: 1px;border-bottom-style: solid;background-color: #85cddb;"><b>MULTIMEDIA</b></div><div class="panelContent">
<p style="text-align: left;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(255,0,0);">&lt;&lt;&lt;&lt; Remove the -EMPTY- option in the Library search field to display Multimedia Libraries &gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;</span></strong></p>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1475810125010_-626868724-150307605-882835973">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1475810125010_-626868724-150307605-882835973');
                if ("true" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1475810125010_-626868724",
                        pageId: "150307605",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: 882835973,
                        hidePane: "true",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475810125010_-626868724"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="882835973"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475810125010_-626868724"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="882835973"] #comboBoxDiv-1475810125010_-626868724').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475810125010_-626868724"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="882835973"] #comboBoxDiv-1475810125010_-626868724').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1467759069105_1745166537-150307605--1064232763">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1467759069105_1745166537-150307605--1064232763');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1467759069105_1745166537",
                        pageId: "150307605",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -1064232763,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1467759069105_1745166537"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-1064232763"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1467759069105_1745166537"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-1064232763"] #comboBoxDiv-1467759069105_1745166537').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1467759069105_1745166537"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-1064232763"] #comboBoxDiv-1467759069105_1745166537').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>

<p><span class="confluence-anchor-link" id="ShovelLP&amp;HP-deployment"></span></p><div class="panel" style="border-width: 1px;"><div class="panelHeader" style="border-bottom-width: 1px;background-color: #B7BF10;"><b>DEPLOYMENT RESOURCES</b></div><div class="panelContent">
<h1 id="ShovelLP&amp;HP-Interfaces">Interfaces</h1><div id="expander-433761694" class="expand-container"><div role="heading" aria-level="6" id="expander-control-433761694" class="expand-control"><button type="button" id="expand-button-433761694" class="aui-button aui-button-link aui-button-link-icon-text" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="expander-content-433761694" ><span class="expand-icon aui-icon aui-icon-small aui-iconfont-chevron-down" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="expand-control-text conf-macro-render">OEM Interfaces....</span></button></div><div role="region" id="expander-content-433761694" class="expand-content" aria-labelledby="expand-button-433761694"><p class="_mce_tagged_br"><strong>Supported Drill HP OEM Interfaces</strong></p><p class="_mce_tagged_br">

<div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1475810206161_-365262930-150307605-1569065120" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1475810206161_-365262930"
     data-page-id="150307605"
     data-session-id="1569065120"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;default&quot;:&quot;%5B0-z%5D&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;userfilter&quot;:&quot;J2shovel&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;datepattern&quot;:&quot;yy-mm-dd&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1475810206161_-365262930&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1475810206161_-365262930-150307605-1569065120">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1475810206161_-365262930-150307605-1569065120');
                if ("true" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1475810206161_-365262930",
                        pageId: "150307605",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: 1569065120,
                        hidePane: "true",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475810206161_-365262930"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="1569065120"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475810206161_-365262930"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="1569065120"] #comboBoxDiv-1475810206161_-365262930').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475810206161_-365262930"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="1569065120"] #comboBoxDiv-1475810206161_-365262930').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>
<h1 id="ShovelLP&amp;HP-ProjectJustifications(Restricted)">Project Justifications (Restricted)</h1><p><table class="aui content-report-table-macro"><thead><tr><th>Título</th><th>Creador</th><th>Modificado</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td colspan="3">No se ha encontrado ningún contenido.</td></tr></tbody></table></p><h1 id="ShovelLP&amp;HP-ScopeofWorks">Scope of Works</h1>

id="TargetDepthOffsetSOW-55650"><a class="external-link" href="https://na4.salesforce.com/5006000000qKKtp" rel="nofollow">55650</a></h2></td><td class="social"></td></tr><tr><td class="title" data-content-id="139670796"><a href="/display/TOPS/Blast+Truck+HP+SOW">Blast Truck HP SOW</a></td><td><div class="content-wrapper"><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge">DRAFT</span></div></td><td>ALL</td><td>Blast Truck HP</td><td><div class="content-wrapper"><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="ROFM" aui-lozenge">DRAFT</span></td><td> Internal</td><td>All</td><td><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="ROFM" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~ROFM" class="social"><span class="icon icon-like">Me gusta:</span> <span class="count">1</span></td></tr><tr><td class="title" data-content-id="50990364"><a href="/display/TOPS/Safemine+CAS+-Mineops+Integration+SOW">Safemine CAS -Mineops Integration SOW</a></td><td><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-success">APPROVED</span></td><td>All</td><td>All</td><td><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="romma" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~romma" data-linked-resource-id="39387868" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">Unknown User (romma)</a></td><td> </td><td class="social"><span class="icon icon-like">Me gusta:</span> <span class="count">1</span></td></tr><tr><td class="title" data-content-id="17072725"><a href="/display/TOPS/OPC">OPC</a></td><td><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge">DRAFT</span></td><td> </td><td>&nbsp;</td><td><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="ari" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~ari" data-linked-resource-id="31659702" data-linked-resource-version="3" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">Unknown User (ari)</a></td><td> </td><td class="social"></td></tr><tr><td class="title" data-content-id="150325290"><a href="/display/TOPS/Primary+and+Secondary+Dump+Definitions">Primary and Secondary Dump Definitions</a></td><td><div class="content-wrapper"><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge">DRAFT</span></div></td><td> </td><td>&nbsp;</td><td> </td><td> </td><td class="social"></td></tr><tr><td class="title" data-content-id="140643034"><a href="/display/TOPS/Putty+Integration+SOW">Putty Integration SOW</a></td><td><div class="content-wrapper"><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge">DRAFT</span></div></td><td>All customers</td><td><a href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/Drill">HxGN Drill HP</a></td><td><div class="content-wrapper"><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="ROFM" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~ROFM" data-linked-resource-id="14680244" data-linked-resource-version="3" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">Unknown User (rofm)</a></div></td><td>N/A</td><td class="social"></td></tr><tr><td class="title" data-content-id="56427156"><a href="/display/TOPS/Vale+S11D+Project+-+SOW">Vale S11D Project - SOW</a></td><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td><td>&nbsp;</td><td><p style="margin-left: 30.0px;"> </p></td><td>&nbsp;</td><td class="social"></td></tr></tbody></table></div></p></div></div>
<div class="tf-body-storage" id="body-storage-1475819164228_919390612-150307605--1056816014" style="display: none;"
     data-macro-id="1475819164228_919390612"
     data-page-id="150307605"
     data-session-id="-1056816014"
     data-is-editable="false"
     data-is-email="$isEmail"
     data-params="{&quot;default&quot;:&quot;shovel&quot;,&quot;sparkName&quot;:&quot;Sparkline&quot;,&quot;userfilter&quot;:&quot;Primary%20Product&quot;,&quot;hidePane&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;datepattern&quot;:&quot;yy-mm-dd&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;1475819164228_919390612&quot;,&quot;sort&quot;:&quot;Status%20(%E2%80%8DDesc)&quot;,&quot;separator&quot;:&quot;Point%20(.)&quot;}">
</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1475819164228_919390612-150307605--1056816014">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1475819164228_919390612-150307605--1056816014');
                if ("true" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: ["Status (\u200dDesc)"],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1475819164228_919390612",
                        pageId: "150307605",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),

                    });

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475819164228_919390612"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-1056816014"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475819164228_919390612"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-1056816014"] #comboBoxDiv-1475819164228_919390612').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1475819164228_919390612"][data-pageid="150307605"][data-sessionid="-1056816014"] #comboBoxDiv-1475819164228_919390612').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();

231786251.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : GVOS/JAMS Server Integration</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="Product-Releases_228590211.html">Product Releases</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="OP-Pro-3.0_231785728.html">OP Pro 3.0</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="Debugging-the-ReactJS-Panel_231786248.html">Debugging the ReactJS Panel</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : GVOS/JAMS Server Integration
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> GEORGE Nathan</span> on feb 16, 2021
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <p><div class="contentLayout2">
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">
<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
<p><style type='text/css'>/*<![CDATA[*/
div.rbtoc1764958723312 {padding: 0px;}
div.rbtoc1764958723312 ul {margin-left: 0px;}
div.rbtoc1764958723312 li {margin-left: 0px;padding-left: 0px;}

/*]]>*/</style><div class='toc-macro rbtoc1764958723312'>
<ul class='toc-indentation'>
<li><a href='#GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-Introduction'>Introduction</a></li>
<li><a href='#GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-GVOS'>GVOS</a>
<ul class='toc-indentation'>
<li><a href='#GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-SchemaMapping'>Schema Mapping</a></li>
<li><a href='#GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-GvWeb'>GvWeb</a>
<ul class='toc-indentation'>
<li><a href='#GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-Nginx'>Nginx</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a href='#GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-Replicator'>Replicator</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div></p></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">
<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
<h1 id="GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-Introduction">Introduction</h1><p>GVOS and JAMS have been integrated so that they can run alongside each other on an Ubuntu server. Both GVOS and JAMS run as replicator servers where GVOS serves as the replicator for all OAS devices (including the devices that are running the GVOS/JAMS integration for the new React panel) while JAMS serves as the replicator server for all legacy JAMS equipment and OPProManager clients. The GVOS and JAMS servers both connect to the same PostgreSQL database which utilizes the JAMS schema with tables and columns from GVOS that do not exist in JAMS merged in.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">
<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
<h1 id="GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-GVOS">GVOS</h1><h2 id="GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-SchemaMapping">Schema Mapping</h2><p>While the schemas for the GVOS and Jigsaw databases have mostly been merged, there are some key differences in some table and column names that require translation between the two systems. You'll notice that the Postgres database on the server uses the Jigsaw database schema with the GVOS schema merged into it so that all of the tables and columns match the schema required by Jigsaw. However, the sqlite database onboard the equipment uses the GVOS database schema with the Jigsaw schema merged into it so that all of the tables and column names match the GVOS schema. For example, on the server the JAMS schema is used for the configurations table (notice that the column names match the names for the Jigsaw schema and that 'override', a gvos column, has been added):</p><blockquote><p>cmkc_test=&gt; \d configurations<br/>Table &quot;public.configurations&quot;<br/>Column | Type | Modifiers <br/>-------------+-----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------<br/>id | integer | not null default nextval('configurations_id_seq'::regclass)<br/>updated_at | timestamp without time zone | <br/>device_id | integer | <br/>module | character varying(256) | <br/>attribute | character varying(256) | <br/>value | text | <br/>application | character varying(40) | <br/>override | boolean |</p></blockquote><p>Meanwhile, the configurations table in the onboard sqlite database uses the GVOS schema (notice that module is now called component and attribute is now called property:</p><blockquote><p>sqlite&gt; .schema configurations<br/>CREATE TABLE configurations (id integer primary key,updated_at datetime,device_id int(4),component varchar(256),property varchar(256),value text,application varchar(40),override int(1));</p></blockquote><p>The mapping between database schemas is handled by GVOS on the server and onboard by parsing database queries and applying the relevant schema mapping to form the correct query. The mapping for column names is hard coded in the GvModel definition for the model while the mapping for table names is configurable through the jams_schema component table_map property. The default configuration for the table mapping is:</p><blockquote><p>table_map=workers=employees,shift_logins=logins,change_configurations=change_configs,worker_vacations=vacations,worker_qualifications=qualifications,replicas_oas=replicas</p></blockquote><h2 id="GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-GvWeb">GvWeb</h2><p>The GVOS REST API is contained in the GvWeb module. By default, GvWeb listens on port 5000 for incoming HTTP requests. GvWeb can be used to query model schema, query model data, and invoke GVOS methods remotely. Some useful queries are:</p><ul><li>http://localhost<strong>/gvos/schema/&lt;Model Name&gt;</strong> this returns information about the schema of the model. For example, <span class="nolink">http://localhost/gvos/schema/GvEquipment</span> will return the schema information for the GvEquipment model.</li><li>http://localhost<strong>/gvos/object/&lt;Model Name&gt; </strong>this returns all of the records for the model in JSON format so that it includes each column name. For example, http://localhost/gvos/object/GvEquipment will return all of the equipment records.</li><li><span class="nolink">http://localhost</span><strong>/gvos/object/&lt;Model Name&gt;/&lt;id&gt; </strong>this returns a specific record for the model. For example, <span class="nolink">http://localhost/gvos/object/GvEquipment/1</span> will return the equipment record that has an id equal to 1.</li><li>http://localhost<strong>/gvos/object/&lt;Model Name&gt;/&lt;column 1&gt;,&lt;column 2&gt;,...,&lt;column n&gt; </strong>this returns the data with only the columns specified in the query. For example, http://localhost/gvos/object/GvEquipment/id,type,name will return only the id, type and name fields for each record.</li><li>http://localhost<strong>/gvos/object/&lt;Model Name&gt;?&lt;condition 1&gt;and&lt;condition 2&gt; </strong>this can be used to add conditions to the query. For example, http://localhost/gvos/object/GvEquipment?type=truck%20and%20status_id=50 will return all records where the type is truck and the status id is 50.</li><li>All of these can be combined to form more complex queries such as http://localhost<strong>/gvos/object/&lt;Model Name&gt;/&lt;column 1&gt;,&lt;column 2&gt;,order=&lt;column 1&gt; DESC?&lt;condition 1&gt;and&lt;condition 2&gt;</strong>, for example, http://localhost/gvos/object/GvEquipment/id,updated_at,type,name,order=updated_at%20DESC?type=truck%20and%20status_id=50 will return the id, updated_at, type, and name columns for all records where type is equal to truck and status_id is equal to 50 using the updated_at column to order in descending order.</li><li>http://localhost<strong>/gvos/&lt;Module&gt;/&lt;Method&gt;</strong> returns the result of executing the method for the module. For example, http://localhost/gvos/GvDevice/this_device returns the result of GvDevice.this_device.</li></ul><h3 id="GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-Nginx">Nginx</h3><p>An Nginx server should be configured to listen on port 80 and forward all requests with the '/gvos/' path to GvWeb.</p><blockquote><p>server {<br/>  listen 80;<br/>  server_name localhost;<br/>  autoindex on;<br/>  access_log /var/log/nginx/localhost.access.log;</p><p>  error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;<br/>  location = /50x.html {<br/>    root share/nginx/html;<br/>  }<br/>  location /gvos/ { <br/>    include proxy_params; <br/>    proxy_pass <span class="nolink">http://localhost:5001</span>; <br/>  }</p><p>}</p></blockquote><h2 id="GVOS/JAMSServerIntegration-Replicator">Replicator</h2><p>The GVOS replicator serves updates to clients over HTTP. The clients connect to the server utilizing the REST API on port 80. When running alongside JAMS, the GVOS server uses the replicas_oas table instead of the replicas table to load the replicas configurations. The JAMS schema map is used to map the data from the Postgres database to the GVOS schema and then it is replicated to the equipment. The JAMS schema mapping is also used when equipment upload data to the server to map it from the GVOS schema to the Jigsaw schema before it is stored in the database.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div></p>
                    </div>

                                        
                                                      
                </div>             </div> 
            <div id="footer" role="contentinfo">
                <section class="footer-body">
                    <p>Document generated by Confluence on dic 05, 2025 11:18</p>
                    <div id="footer-logo"><a href="https://www.atlassian.com/">Atlassian</a></div>
                </section>
            </div>
        </div>     </body>
</html>





231786286.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>

and map control being delivered in OP Pro 3.1 and Shell App</p><p>Layers to be reviewed to ensure completeness</p></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-error">UNDER ASSESSMENT</span></p></div></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><br/></td></tr><tr><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">All</td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">Safety Inspection</td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">Safety Inspection feature is a variation of the prestart and used an operator logged in in the system need to log out (for a lunch break. bath, etc) and when it is back instead of do the all prestart items again is presented to him the &quot;safety inspection&quot;  list only, it is just a sub-set from the prestart items. In general worlds is a feature that will present a short list of items to check in case the same operator is doing the login again in the same shift.</td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">Required feature</td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-moved">TO BE SCHEDULED</span></p></div></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><br/></td></tr><tr><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">TruckLP</td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">Discriminator UI additions</td><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1637126280390_-1232533032-219820794--282183279">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1637126280390_-1232533032-219820794--282183279');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("yy-mm-dd"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1637126280390_-1232533032",
                        pageId: "219820794",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "0,1,2,3",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: "",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "365|5|8|y w d h m|y w d h m",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: -282183279,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1637126280390_-1232533032"][data-pageid="219820794"][data-sessionid="-282183279"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1637126280390_-1232533032"][data-pageid="219820794"][data-sessionid="-282183279"] #comboBoxDiv-1637126280390_-1232533032').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1637126280390_-1232533032"][data-pageid="219820794"][data-sessionid="-282183279"] #comboBoxDiv-1637126280390_-1232533032').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>

                    <div class='plugin-tabmeta-details'><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Question</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">Does it support LTE? Will the communications metrics dynamically update depending on whether its WiFi or LTE?</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Answer</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">This is more a hardware capability not sotfware in that case, so in case site has a Core with LTE yes.</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Supporting Documents</th><td class="confluenceTd"><a href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/PPC/4G+on+Core">4G on Core</a></td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Key Word Search</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">LTE, Core, New Panels</td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Status</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-current">ANSWERED</span></p></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>

231790256.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : How Long Does It Take New React Panel To Load?</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>

                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>

                                <span><a href="OP-Pro-FAQ_224018006.html">OP Pro FAQ</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : How Long Does It Take New React Panel To Load?
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> NIELSEN John</span>, last modified on feb 23, 2021
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">

                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>

                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : Is The GVOS RestAPI Secured?
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> NIELSEN John</span> on feb 23, 2021

                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <div class='plugin-tabmeta-details'><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Question</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">Is the GVOS RestAPI secured?</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Answer</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">By default localhost is trusted, meaning no authentication is needed. For anyone else connecting to gvos's web component, requires to implement an SSL/TLS authentication protocol.</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Supporting Documents</th><td class="confluenceTd"></td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Key Word Search</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">API, Rest, GVOS</td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Status</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-current">ANSWERED</span></p></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>

        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : HTTP Is An Insecure Protocol.  Can HTTPS Be Supported.  Onboard And Between Onboard+Server</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>

                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : HTTP Is An Insecure Protocol.  Can HTTPS Be Supported.  Onboard And Between Onboard+Server
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> NIELSEN John</span> on feb 23, 2021
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <div class='plugin-tabmeta-details'><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Question</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">HTTP is an insecure protocol. Can HTTPS be supported. Onboard and between Onboard+Server</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Answer</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">HTTPS is implemented as a configurable option. So far no customer has requested HTTPS to be configured. Usually VPN is used to secure connections between clients and server.</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Supporting Documents</th><td class="confluenceTd"></td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Key Word Search</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">HTTP, HTTPS, Security</td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Status</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-current">ANSWERED</span></p></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>

231790442.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : Is OpenVPN Used Anymore With The New Panels Or Is All Communications Now Via HTTP?</title>

        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : Currently Config Settings Changed By The User Are Lost On Power Cycle?  Are There Any Plans To Support Persistent User Profiles?</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>

                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">

                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : Currently Config Settings Changed By The User Are Lost On Power Cycle?  Are There Any Plans To Support Persistent User Profiles?
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> NIELSEN John</span> on feb 23, 2021
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <div class='plugin-tabmeta-details'><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Question</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">Currently config setting changed by the user are lost on power cycle?     <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : Can Multiple Versions Of OP Pro Manager Run On Same PC?</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="OP-Pro-FAQ_224018006.html">OP Pro FAQ</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : Can Multiple Versions Of OP Pro Manager Run On Same PC?
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> NIELSEN John</span> on feb 23, 2021
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <div class='plugin-tabmeta-details'><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Question</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">Is it possible to run multiple versions of OP Pro Manager on the one pc and point to different customer environments? e.g. v3.0, v2.8, v2.7?</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Answer</th><td class="confluenceTd">No</td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Supporting Documents</th><td class="confluenceTd"></td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Key Word Search</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">OP, Pro, Manager, Multiple, Versions</td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Status</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-current">ANSWERED</span></p></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>
                    </div>

                                        
                                                        <div class="pageSection group">
                        <div class="pageSectionHeader">
                            <h2 id="comments" class="pageSectionTitle">Comments:</h2>
                        </div>

                        <table border="0" width="100%">
                                                        <tr>
                                <td >
                                    <a name="comment-281884832"></a>
                                    <font class="smallfont"><p>Hi <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="NIEJ" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~NIEJ" data-linked-resource-id="21365455" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">NIELSEN John</a> ,<br/>There was a request from one of our customers to run on the same PC twice OPProManager same version.<br/>Apparently, windows allows to start multiple times the same software using a different user, so we test it and works fine.</p></font>
                                    <div align="left" class="smallfont" style="color: #666666; width: 98%; margin-bottom: 10px;">
                                        <img src="images/icons/contenttypes/comment_16.png" height="16" width="16" border="0" align="absmiddle"/>

                                    </div>
                                </td>

        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">

                        </span>

                </div>

No point we don't suggest it for now is due the &quot;extra work&quot; done to setup the platform 2.26. Technically no restriction for that.</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Supporting Documents</th><td class="confluenceTd"></td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Key Word Search</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">2.26, Ruby, Platform, Version</td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Status</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-current">ANSWERED</span></p></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>

231790488.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : How Will The Change From Non-Production Activities To Production Activities Occur?</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="OP-Pro-FAQ_224018006.html">OP Pro FAQ</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : How Will The Change From Non-Production Activities To Production Activities Occur?
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> NIELSEN John</span>, last modified on feb 23, 2021
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <div class='plugin-tabmeta-details'><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Question</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">How will the change from Non-production activities to Production activities occur?</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Answer</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">The change from Production activities to Non-production activities will be updated using activity detection on the panel. e.g. if tipping, then assigned to tie down for shift change JAMS will created a moving empty activity. Panel will update dynamically to non-production activity wheel. For Non-Production to Production activities operater can select the Production activity (tipping or hauling) if not auto detected. </span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Supporting Documents</th><td class="confluenceTd"></td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Key Word Search</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">Non-Production,Production, Activities, Activity, Wheel</td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Status</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-current">ANSWERED</span></p></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>
                    </div>

                                        
                                                      
                </div>             </div> 
            <div id="footer" role="contentinfo">
                <section class="footer-body">
                    <p>Document generated by Confluence on dic 05, 2025 11:18</p>
                    <div id="footer-logo"><a href="https://www.atlassian.com/">Atlassian</a></div>
                </section>
            </div>
        </div>     </body>
</html>





234433824.html


<!DOCTYPE html>

target='_top'>todo_view</li></a><li><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796812#OPPro3.0TRM24AppendixIOPProManagerViewsandConfigurations-UserTranslations' target='_top'>User Translations</li></a><li><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796812#OPPro3.0TRM24AppendixIOPProManagerViewsandConfigurations-translation_view' target='_top'>translation_view</li></a><li><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796812#OPPro3.0TRM24AppendixIOPProManagerViewsandConfigurations-Users' target='_top'>Users</li></a><li><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796812#OPPro3.0TRM24AppendixIOPProManagerViewsandConfigurations-user_view' target='_top'>user_view</li></a></ul><li><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796812#OPPro3.0TRM24AppendixIOPProManagerViewsandConfigurations-Applications' target='_top'>Applications</li></a><ul><li><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796812#OPPro3.0TRM24AppendixIOPProManagerViewsandConfigurations-JSMine' target='_top'>JS Mine</li></a><li><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796812#OPPro3.0TRM24AppendixIOPProManagerViewsandConfigurations-JSMTC' target='_top'>JS MTC</li></a><li><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796812#OPPro3.0TRM24AppendixIOPProManagerViewsandConfigurations-JSPlayback' target='_top'>JS Playback</li></a></ul></ul><li class='page'><span><a href='https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=231796814' target='_top'>OP Pro 3.0 TRM 25 - Glossary</a></span><span class='commander-open-plus-minus-circle left' id='header-commander-icon-33' title='Open headers of this page.'></span></li><ul class='header-ul closed-headers' id='header-commander-ul-33'><li><a                     </div>

                                        
                                                      
                </div>             </div>
