BIB-Stabilization---Hypercare-issues-status_350946985.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : BIB Stabilization - Hypercare issues status</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="Product-Support_254971960.html">Product Support</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="2024-06-AMM-BIB-4.0-000-Critical-Escalations_347311125.html">2024-06 AMM BIB 4.0-000 Critical Escalations</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : BIB Stabilization - Hypercare issues status
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> LAUREANO Bruna</span>, last modified by <span class='editor'> YEUNG Aaron</span> on feb 27, 2025
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <div class="contentLayout2">
<div class="columnLayout single" data-layout="single">
<div class="cell normal" data-type="normal">
<div class="innerCell">
<p><span style="font-size: 20.0px;letter-spacing: -0.008em;">OP Pro version page: </span><a href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/JP/4.0-000">4.0-000</a></p><p><br/></p><div class="panel" style="border-width: 1px;"><div class="panelHeader" style="border-bottom-width: 1px;"><b>Summary</b></div><div class="panelContent">
<p>

        <span class="oauth-msg">
            <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a>
        para ver datos del tique
        </span>
    <div class="jira-chart-macro-preview-container">
    <div class="aui-message-container"><div class="aui-message warning">El servidor de Jira no comprendió su consulta de búsqueda. Si has introducido JQL, asegúrate de que está formado correctamente. Si has introducido una clave de tique, asegúrate de que exista y de que tienes permiso para verla.</div></div>
</div>
        <div>
            <span class="oauth-msg">
                <a class="static-oauth-init" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/plugins/servlet/applinks/oauth/login-dance/authorize?applicationLinkID=ab53f6db-1037-3a9d-bb3c-d8ebd242d4b5">Autenticar</a>
                para ver datos del tique
            </span>
    </div>
    <div class="two-dimensional-chart">
    <div class="aui-message-container"><div class="aui-message warning">El servidor de Jira no comprendió su consulta de búsqueda. Si has introducido JQL, asegúrate de que está formado correctamente. Si has introducido una clave de tique, asegúrate de que exista y de que tienes permiso para verla.</div></div>
</div>
</p>
</div></div><p><br/></p><p><br/></p><h2 id="BIBStabilizationHypercareissuesstatus-Executivesummary:"><strong>Executive summary:</strong></h2><p>The tickets we need to close, which are critical, to leave the BIB site from Hypercare status are:<span style="letter-spacing: 0.0px;"> </span></p><p><br/></p><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable" data-snooker-col-series="numbers" data-snooker-locked-cols="0"><colgroup><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="numberingColumn highlight-#c1c7d0 confluenceTh" contenteditable="false" data-highlight-colour="#c1c7d0" data-mce-resize="false" scope="col" title="Background color : Medium grey 45%"><br/></th><th class="highlight-#c1c7d0 confluenceTh" data-highlight-colour="#c1c7d0" scope="col" title="Background color : Medium grey 45%">Item description</th><th class="highlight-#c1c7d0 confluenceTh" data-highlight-colour="#c1c7d0" scope="col" title="Background color : Medium grey 45%">Status</th><th class="highlight-#c1c7d0 confluenceTh" data-highlight-colour="#c1c7d0" scope="col" title="Background color : Medium grey 45%">Last status dates</th><th class="highlight-#c1c7d0 confluenceTh" data-highlight-colour="#c1c7d0" scope="col" title="Background color : Medium grey 45%">Accountable person</th><th class="highlight-#c1c7d0 confluenceTh" data-highlight-colour="#c1c7d0" scope="col" title="Background color : Medium grey 45%">Status detail</th><th class="highlight-#c1c7d0 confluenceTh" data-highlight-colour="#c1c7d0" scope="col" title="Background color : Medium grey 45%">Tickets list</th></tr><tr><td class="numberingColumn confluenceTd" contenteditable="false" data-mce-resize="false">1</td><td class="confluenceTd">Missing loads</td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-success">DONE</span></p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><time datetime="2024-11-18" class="date-past">18 nov 2024</time> </p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="TOK" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~TOK" data-linked-resource-id="153755981" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">TUMANAN Okvian</a>   </p><p><br/></p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><time datetime="2024-11-07" class="date-past">7 nov 2024</time></p><ul><li>As discussed in the meeting at <time datetime="2024-11-06" class="date-past">6 nov 2024</time> , with current Reconciler configuration the number of manual extra-load that Smart Center need to add have decreased. We will monitor the current numbers for the next 10 days before close it. In case the number maintain we are fine to close it.</li></ul></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><br/></p>

    </span>
</p><p><br/></p></div></td></tr><tr><td class="numberingColumn confluenceTd" contenteditable="false" data-mce-resize="false">4</td><td class="confluenceTd"><p style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgb(23,43,77);">Summarizer errors post 4.0-000.115 install. Load_material_tonnages functon</span></p></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-moved">NEW</span></p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><time datetime="2024-09-19" class="date-past">19 sept 2024</time> </p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="VIFA" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~VIFA" data-linked-resource-id="306056666" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">VIEIRA Fabio</a> </p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><time datetime="2024-09-19" class="date-past">19 sept 2024</time> </p><ul><li>Ticket <a class="unresolved" href="#">IN-6087</a> is already prioritized on PD backlog (waiting ongoing tasks be completed to have a resource assigned to it)</li></ul><p>Added from <a class="confluence-userlink user-mention" data-username="GENA" href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/~GENA" data-linked-resource-id="202706461" data-linked-resource-version="2" data-linked-resource-type="userinfo" data-base-url="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com">GEORGE Nathan</a>  on <time datetime="2024-09-19" class="date-past">19 sept 2024</time> </p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p>

        <a class=issue-link" href="https://jira.hexagonmining.com/browse/IN-6087?src=confmacro">IN-6087</a>

    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">

                            </li>

                                <span><a href="OP-Pro-3.0_231785728.html">OP Pro 3.0</a></span>

                            </li>
