</div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="tf-init-script-1723096716578_-488457823-334113132-116579327">
    (function() {
        function start($) {
            AJS.toInit(function() {
                $ = window.$ || $;
                const script = $('#tf-init-script-1723096716578_-488457823-334113132-116579327');
                if ("Filtration panel" !== "true") {
                    script.parents(".panel, .alertPanel, .infoPanel, .innerCell").css("overflow", "visible");
                }
                script.remove();
                const init = function() {
                  TableFilterUtils.renderPanels($);
                  const tf = new TableFilter({
                        showNRows: "",
                        showNRowsifNotFiltered: "",
                        rowsPerPage: "",
                        ignoreFirstNrows: "",
                        limitHeight: "",
                        heightValue: "",
                        numbering: "",
                        sorts: [],
                        datepattern: TableUtils.unescapeString("dd M yy"),
                        separator: ".",
                        id: "1723096716578_-488457823",
                        pageId: "334113132",
                        sparkline: false,
                        sparkName: TableUtils.unescapeString("Sparkline"),
                        order: "1,2,0",
                        isOR: "AND",
                        ddSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString("‚"),
                        ddSeparators: "",
                        ddOperator: "OR,OR",
                        fixedCols: "",
                        totalrow: ",,,,,,",
                        totalcol: "",
                        isLockEnabled: false,
                        worklog: "365|5|8|y w d h m|y w d h m",
                        updateSelectOptions: false,
                        totalColName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        totalRowName: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        thousandSeparator: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                        tabs: false,
                        sessionId: 116579327,
                        hidePane: "Filtration panel",
                        customNoTableMsg: false,
                        customNoTableMsgText: TableUtils.unescapeString(""),
                    });

                    if (tf == null) return;

                    $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1723096716578_-488457823"][data-pageid="334113132"][data-sessionid="116579327"]').attr("init-done", "true");

                    if ($("div.wiki-content.view-template").length) {
                        tf.comboBoxDiv.find("button").removeAttr("aria-disabled");
                        tf.saveBtn.remove();
                    }
                };

                var check = function() {
                    if (window.TableFilter) {
                        init();
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1723096716578_-488457823"][data-pageid="334113132"][data-sessionid="116579327"] #comboBoxDiv-1723096716578_-488457823').show();
                    } else {
                        $('.tablefilter-outer-wrapper[data-id="1723096716578_-488457823"][data-pageid="334113132"][data-sessionid="116579327"] #comboBoxDiv-1723096716578_-488457823').hide();
                        WRM.require("wrc!com.stiltsoft.confluence.tablefilter-resources", function() {
                            check();
                        });
                    }
                };

                check();
            });

        }

        if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                start(AJS.$);
            });
        } else {
            start(AJS.$);
        }
    })();
</script>

WaterTruck---Activity-Wheel_334113501.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : WaterTruck - Activity Wheel</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">

                            </li>

                                <span><a href="Product-Management_258824687.html">Product Management</a></span>

                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : WaterTruck - Activity Wheel
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">

                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    
<div class="table-excerpt te " data-pageid="334113501" data-name="uat"        data-id="$macroId" >
    <div class="table-wrap"><table class="fixed-width wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup class=""><col class="" style="width: 129.0px;"/><col class="" style="width: 148.0px;"/><col style="width: 148.0px;"/><col class="" style="width: 128.0px;"/><col class="" style="width: 360.0px;"/><col class="" style="width: 229.0px;"/><col class="" style="width: 60.0px;"/></colgroup><tbody class=""><tr class=""><th class="confluenceTh">Issue#</th><th class="confluenceTh">Validation Item</th><th class="confluenceTh">Version</th><th class="confluenceTh">Status</th><th class="confluenceTh">Test Result</th><th class="confluenceTh">Expected Result</th><th class="confluenceTh">Notes</th></tr><tr class=""><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd">Activity Wheel</td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-error">FAILED</span></p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd">Disappears from panel when the equipment id idle.</td><td class="confluenceTd">Should always be visible(?)</td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

WaterTruck---Road-Conditions_334113503.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : WaterTruck - Road Conditions</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="Product-Management_258824687.html">Product Management</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="334113043.html">Testing &amp; Validation</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="334113045.html">OP Pro Plugin | Aux LP panel UAT</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="Water-Truck-UAT_334113132.html">Water Truck UAT</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : WaterTruck - Road Conditions
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> HOLDEN Anthony</span>, last modified on ago 08, 2024
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    
<div class="table-excerpt te " data-pageid="334113503" data-name="uat"        data-id="$macroId" >
    <div class="table-wrap"><table class="fixed-width wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup class=""><col class="" style="width: 5.21463%;"/><col class="" style="width: 13.9295%;"/><col style="width: 13.9295%;"/><col class="" style="width: 9.2149%;"/><col class="" style="width: 27.1447%;"/><col class="" style="width: 26.8534%;"/><col class="" style="width: 17.644%;"/></colgroup><tbody class=""><tr class=""><th class="confluenceTh">Issue#</th><th class="confluenceTh">Validation Item</th><th class="confluenceTh">Version</th><th class="confluenceTh">Status</th><th class="confluenceTh">Test Result</th><th class="confluenceTh">Expected Result</th><th class="confluenceTh">Notes</th></tr><tr class=""><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd">Road condition icons</td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-error">FAILED</span></p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><p>Using the config specified <a href="https://confluence.hexagonmining.com/display/PE/Road+Conditions#RoadConditions-displayIcons">here</a>, the road condition icons don't appear on the equipment GPS map.</p></td><td class="confluenceTd"><p>The road condition should be seen on the map</p><p><br/></p></td><td class="confluenceTd"><p><br/></p></td></tr><tr class=""><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd">Clearing Road Conditions</td><td class="confluenceTd"><br/></td><td class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-moved">REVIEW</span></p></div></td><td class="confluenceTd"><p>The logic doesn't seem to take into account the exact location of the dusty road condition - the sprayer can be turned on momentarily, with the watertruck not even passing the location of the dusty road (with the sprayer on) - the road condition will still be cleared.</p></td><td class="confluenceTd"><p>The watertruck should actually pass the location of the dusty road condition with the sprayer on for it to be cleared.</p><p><br/></p></td><td class="confluenceTd"><p><br/></p></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
</div>
<p><br/></p>
                    </div>

                                        
                                                      
                </div>             </div> 
            <div id="footer" role="contentinfo">
                <section class="footer-body">
                    <p>Document generated by Confluence on dic 05, 2025 11:18</p>
                    <div id="footer-logo"><a href="https://www.atlassian.com/">Atlassian</a></div>
                </section>
            </div>
        </div>     </body>
</html>





What-are-the-Peer-to-Peer-Replicated-Tables_231790478.html


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Product: MineOperate OP Pro : What are the Peer to Peer Replicated Tables</title>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/site.css" type="text/css" />
        <META http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    </head>

    <body class="theme-default aui-theme-default">
        <div id="page">
            <div id="main" class="aui-page-panel">
                <div id="main-header">
                    <div id="breadcrumb-section">
                        <ol id="breadcrumbs">
                            <li class="first">
                                <span><a href="index.html">Product: MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="MineOperate-OP-Pro_224018004.html">MineOperate OP Pro</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                    <li>
                                <span><a href="OP-Pro-FAQ_224018006.html">OP Pro FAQ</a></span>
                            </li>
                                                </ol>
                    </div>
                    <h1 id="title-heading" class="pagetitle">
                                                <span id="title-text">
                            Product: MineOperate OP Pro : What are the Peer to Peer Replicated Tables
                        </span>
                    </h1>
                </div>

                <div id="content" class="view">
                    <div class="page-metadata">
                        
        
    
    
        
    
        
        
            Created by <span class='author'> NIELSEN John</span>, last modified by <span class='editor'> GEORGE Nathan</span> on feb 24, 2021
                        </div>
                    <div id="main-content" class="wiki-content group">
                    <div class='plugin-tabmeta-details'><div class="table-wrap"><table class="wrapped confluenceTable"><colgroup><col/><col/></colgroup><tbody><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Question</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">What tables/data sets are updated by the Peer to Peer feature? Is it only the grades, boundaries &amp; enums? Are other production tables updated? activities, loads, hauls, states?</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Answer</th><td class="confluenceTd"><span style="color: rgb(0,0,0);">For reference data only Grades, Boundaries and Enum (as is mentioned in the documentation). For production purposes, only traveling table, only for cycling purposes.</span></td></tr><tr><th class="confluenceTh">Supporting Documents</th><td class="confluenceTd"></td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Key Word Search</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd">Peer, Replicated, Tables</td></tr><tr><th colspan="1" class="confluenceTh">Status</th><td colspan="1" class="confluenceTd"><div class="content-wrapper"><p><span class="status-macro aui-lozenge aui-lozenge-current">ANSWERED</span></p></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>
                    </div>

                                        
                                                      
                </div>             </div> 
            <div id="footer" role="contentinfo">
                <section class="footer-body">
                    <p>Document generated by Confluence on dic 05, 2025 11:18</p>
                    <div id="footer-logo"><a href="https://www.atlassian.com/">Atlassian</a></div>
                </section>
            </div>
        </div>     </body>
</html>

                    <ul>
                    <li>
                <a href="231790436.html">HTTP Is An Insecure Protocol.  Can HTTPS Be Supported.  Onboard And Between Onboard+Server</a>
